product_name: The North Face Denali Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Denali jacket for girls is a heavyweight fleece that offers warmth and comfort for serious outdoor play or just hanging out in style. Exceptionally warm, mostly recycled heavyweight Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed water. Abrasion-resistant nylon overlays on elbows and upper body and reinforced stitching in high-stress areas increase durability. The North Face Denali jacket features zippered, tricot-lined handwarmer pockets, non-binding nylon/Lycra(R) spandex cuffs and an elastic bound hem. Full-length front zipper extends high for neck protection; write-on ID label helps prevent loss. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Denali jacket for girls is a heavyweight fleece that offers warmth and comfort for serious outdoor play or just hanging out in style.
